title: Flourless oat and blueberry pancakes
ingredients: ['160g porridge oats', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons honey', '4 egg whites', '4 tablespoons milk', '4 tablespoons coconut oil, melted', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '150g fresh or frozen blueberries']
